visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Top 10 nuclear vs renewable energy producers (2011)', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be the names of the top 10 countries, Y-axis labels should be formatted as percentages, Data series: Three series with names 'Hydropower', 'Other renewable', and 'Nuclear', each with corresponding data for the top 10 countries, Custom colors: Use specific border colors for each series, Additional configurations: Enable percentage stacking for columns, include a tooltip that shows the percentage of each series, and set the subtitle to a Wikipedia source link.

title.text: Top 10 nuclear vs renewable energy producers (2011)

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart that visualizes the top 10 countries by nuclear and renewable energy production in 2011. The chart includes a title and subtitle, with the subtitle linking to a Wikipedia source. The X-axis displays the names of the top 10 countries, while the Y-axis labels are formatted as percentages. The chart features three data series: 'Hydropower', 'Other renewable', and 'Nuclear', each with specific data points for each country. The columns are stacked in percentage mode, allowing for a clear comparison of the contribution of each energy type to the total production. The tooltip displays the percentage of each series when hovering over the columns. Additionally, each series has a custom border color to distinguish them visually.
